start.text: You find yourself in a dark and mysterious forest.

options.text: Ignore the forest and walk towards the mountains

exploreForest.text: As you explore the forest, you encounter a magical creature.

options.text: Attempt to communicate with the creature

communicateCreature.text: The creature responds positively. It offers to guide you through the forest.

options.text: Decline and continue exploring on your own

runAway.text: You run away from the creature, but you get lost in the dense forest.

options.text: Try to find your way back
Continue exploring deeper into the forest

findWayBack.text: After some time, you manage to find your way back to the starting point.

exploreDeeper.text: As you explore deeper into the forest, you discover a hidden cave.

options.text: Decide it's too risky and head back

cave.text: Inside the cave, you find a treasure chest.

options.text: Leave the cave without opening the chest

leaveCave.text: You leave the cave and continue your journey through the forest.

mountains.text: You reach the base of the towering mountains.

options.text: Decide it's too challenging and return to the forest

climbMountains.text: You bravely climb the mountains and reach the summit.

searchForWayDown.text: While searching for a way down, you discover a hidden path.

hiddenPath.text: The hidden path leads you to a magical garden.

options.text: Leave the garden and continue your journey

differentRoute.text: You take a different route down the mountains and encounter a group of friendly travelers.

options.text: Join the travelers on their journey
Thank the travelers and continue on your own

continueJourney.text: You continue your journey, uncertain of what lies ahead.

exploreFurther.text: Your exploration leads you to new lands and exciting adventures.

reflectAdventures.text: As you reflect on your adventures, you realize the journey was the true treasure.

planNewAdventures.text: Excited for the future, you begin planning new adventures.

rest.text: You decide to take a well-deserved rest before the next adventure.

options.text: Wake up and continue the journey

happyEnding.text: Congratulations! You've reached a happy ending in your journey.
